responsibilities: Developed Python application to go through a repository of product inspection images, sort by disposition, rename the files, and output them into a separate folder for manual inspection.
Developed automated subroutines to generate robot position coordinates to reduce the number of robot positions that need to be manually taught.
Developed a code structure for robot motion control. As a result, the robot code was more adaptable, debug friendly, and easier to read
Led efforts to investigate PLC scripting capability. The purpose was to explore means to further improve and condense existing codebase.
Learned how to use industrial computer vision software to optimize and improve existing methods of finished product quality inspection.
Led a project to develop a computer vision based teleoperation robot arm
Developed application to utilize depth sensing and skeleton tracking capabilities of Microsoft Kinect V2 to tele-operate a robotic arm
Designed and manufactured a pan and tilt camera gimbal capable of tracking and following a user specified color.
Applied PID control algorithm and OpenCV Color tracking
Created 3D design of a motorized camera slider
Sourced hardware and electrical components to fit a reasonable budget
3D printed and assembled custom designed components
Programmed User interface and motor functions

degrees.degree: M.S. in Mechanical Engineering, Control Systems
